Authors: Maria E Ordonez, Charles Wesley Barnes
Title:
Macrocyclic Edythea quitensis (Lagerh.) rust on Berberis
species in Ecuador
Abstract:
In this paper we report Edythea quitensis rust found on
Berberis hallii Benoist in Ecuador, as having a full macrocyclic
autoecious life cycle; we include sequence analysis of the internal
transcribed spacer (ITS) region of nuclear ribosomal DNA for three spore
types, and also show the phylogenetic relationship between Edythea rust
samples collected on B. hallii in Ecuador with rust collected from other
Berberis species abroad.
